pages.text: Commands that adjust configurations for mods or provide other utility

$(br)$(li)$(l)/wailac config open$()$(br) Lets you configure the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/wthit-forge)What Am I Looking At$() mod. $(br)$(li)$(l)/wailac overlay <true | false>$()$(br) Toggles the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/wthit-forge)What Am I Looking At$() mod overlay.
